title: Magnitude Software CTO Discusses the Business Case for Analytics: Live on DMRadio Sept. 10
text:
Magnitude Software's CTO will join the DMRadio broadcast on Sept. 10 to discuss best practices for successful analytics programs.
Austin, Texas
Magnitude Software, a leading provider of Enterprise Information Management (EIM) software, today announced that Darren Peirce, vice president of products and CTO, will join the DMRadio broadcast on Sept. 10 to discuss best practices for successful analytics programs. DM Radio broadcasts programs featuring business technology trends from the Information Management website at http://www.information-management.com/dmradio/ .
WHAT: Back to Basics: Ensuring Business Value from Analytics: Always start with a business case! This mantra continues to drive successful analytics programs. Regardless of which technologies a company uses to derive insights from data, the business case must always drive the bus. That said, balancing issues like cost, time and human resources against the need to somehow elevate the business is a challenge that calls for careful attention to detail. Register for this episode of DM Radio to hear Host Eric Kavanagh interview several analytics experts about their suggested best practices.
WHEN: This event takes place on Thurs., Sept. 10 at 3 p.m. ET and lasts one hour, then is archived.
WHO: Darren Peirce is responsible for assessing Magnitude Software’s technology direction and evaluating new technologies in support of the company’s product strategy. As CTO, Darren plays a key role in developing and maturing partnerships with leading technology companies. Darren previously served as group vice president of product management at Kalido. Prior to this role, he was lead solution architect and manager of the professional services organization in the United Kingdom, after joining Royal Dutch Shell as a senior consultant in 1998.
REGISTER: http://www.information-management.com/dmradio/back-to-basics-ensuring-business-value-from-analytics-10027421-1.html
About Magnitude Software
Magnitude Software is a leading provider of Enterprise Information Management software driving real business results for more than 600 active enterprise customers with over 200,000 users in 100 countries. Magnitude Software offers a family of award-winning applications, from business intelligence and data warehousing to master data management, reporting and analytics. At the core of Magnitude’s business is a passionate focus on customer success and a vision to accelerate and automate the end-to-end process of integrating, managing and analyzing information to support business decision making, while reducing operational cost and risk. For more information, please visit http://www.magnitudesoftware.com .
